data.title: Charging stations in Drammen
data.meta_description: 27 charging stations for electric cars in Drammen
data.text:
Check all the chargers for electric cars that are available in Drammen, which includes all EV chargers located in this city. In our database we have a total of 27 charge points in this region of Norway.

The most recent charger in Drammen is Uno-X Gulskogen. It was added on 24/02/2024 and is located in the zip code 3048.

3 of the 27 chargers were actually added in the last 6 months, and 4 were added in the last 12 months. This information is very useful to get an idea of how fast the deployment of charge points is going in Drammen.

Most of the chargers are Schuko (EU Plug) and there are 25 of them.

Electromaps is the best way to find the closest EV charger for your car in Drammen. Our charge points also include pictures and comments shared by our very engaged community of thousands of users, which rate charge points and provide more useful information to create the best experience for electric car drivers.

By using the filters in the mobile app or web map, you can sort the charge points in Drammen depending on the type of plug that corresponds to your electric car, network/provider, charger status, placement, etc.
